#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
long long int a[1025],n,k;
int main() {

 scanf ("%lld %lld",&n,&k);
  for (int i=1;i<=n;i++)
  scanf ("%lld",&a[i]);

   for (int x=1;x<=n-1;x++){
    for (int y=x+1;y<=n;y++){

     if (a[x]+a[y]==k) {printf ("Yes\n");return 0;}
    }
   }

    printf ("No\n");

return 0;}
